com.vmware.vcenter.lcm

Interface Upgrade

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service, UpgradeTypes
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UpgradeStub

    public interface Upgrade
extends Service, UpgradeTypes
    The service to upgrade an existing appliance to Embedded VCSA, PSC, and Management VCSA.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.vcenter.lcm.UpgradeTypes

        UpgradeTypes.Spec, UpgradeTypes.UpgradeDestinationAppliance

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.vmware.vcenter.lcm.UpgradeTypes

    • Method Detail

      • check_Task

        java.lang.String check_Task(UpgradeTypes.Spec spec,
                          DeploymentOption options)
        Performs a precheck for the given specification. The result of this operation can be queried by calling the cis/tasks/{task-id} with the task-id in the response of this call.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation is a task identifier which will be returned by this method.

        Parameters:
        spec - The specification of the deployment.
        options - The deployment precheck options.
        Returns:
        identifier for the task created by this API invocation
        Throws:
        InvalidArgument - If the given spec and/or option contains error.

      • check_Task

        java.lang.String check_Task(UpgradeTypes.Spec spec,
                          DeploymentOption options,
                          InvocationConfig invocationConfig)
        Performs a precheck for the given specification. The result of this operation can be queried by calling the cis/tasks/{task-id} with the task-id in the response of this call.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation is a task identifier which will be returned by this method. Use invocationConfig to specify configuration for this particular invocation.

        Parameters:
        spec - The specification of the deployment.
        options - The deployment precheck options.
        invocationConfig - Configuration for the method invocation.
        Returns:
        identifier for the task created by this API invocation
        Throws:
        InvalidArgument - If the given spec and/or option contains error.

      • check_Task

        void check_Task(UpgradeTypes.Spec spec,
              DeploymentOption options,
              AsyncCallback<java.lang.String> asyncCallback)
        Performs a precheck for the given specification. The result of this operation can be queried by calling the cis/tasks/{task-id} with the task-id in the response of this call.

        Asynchronous method overload. Result of the invocation which is a task identifier will be reported via the specified asyncCallback.

        Invocation Result:
        identifier for the task created by this API invocation

        Operation Errors:
        InvalidArgument - If the given spec and/or option contains error.

        Parameters:
        spec - The specification of the deployment.
        options - The deployment precheck options.
        asyncCallback - Receives the status (progress, result or error) of the operation invocation.
